description_txt: stated on April 16, 2020 in a Fox News appearance:
quote_txt: There are “360,000 (deaths) a year from swimming pools. But we don’t shut the country down for that.”

description_txt: stated on April 15, 2020 in an April 15, 2020 press conference:
quote_txt: “During the flu pandemic of 1918, some cities lifted social distancing measures too fast, too soon, and created a second wave of pandemic.”

description_txt: stated on April 10, 2020 in a Twitter post:
quote_txt: “Per order from @GovWhitmer, people in Michigan are now banned from purchasing a new baby car seat in stores.”

description_txt: stated on April 3, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Walmart is adopting a staggered shopping schedule by age group during the COVID-19 pandemic.

description_txt: stated on April 9, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says Nancy Pelosi called Social Security recipients “leeches” and “burdens on society.”

description_txt: stated on April 14, 2020 in an endorsement announcement:
quote_txt: Joe Biden "already has what is the most progressive platform of any major party nominee in history."

description_txt: stated on April 6, 2020 in a tweet:
quote_txt: NC liquor stores were deemed essential “because we have a lot of people who are chemically dependent on alcohol and if we suddenly cut off their access they would go into withdrawal and flood the emergency rooms.”

description_txt: stated on April 14, 2020 in an April 14, 2020 press briefing:
quote_txt: “Obesity is, like, the No. 1 factor in whether you really get hit hard by COVID-19.”

description_txt: stated on January 14, 2020 in a rally:
quote_txt: Says Madison and Milwaukee County both carry sanctuary status for illegal immigrants and released undocumented immigrants who have committed multiple crimes including sexual assault of a child

description_txt: stated on April 16, 2020 in a tweet:
quote_txt: Says House Speaker Nancy Pelosi deleted a video of her telling people to go to Chinatown.

description_txt: stated on April 16, 2020 in a post on Facebook:
quote_txt: “Africans living in China now being forced to sleep outside in the cold” as “Chinese nationals blame them for the rising number of new coronavirus cases in the country.”

description_txt: stated on April 14, 2020 in his online video endorsement of Joe Biden for president:
quote_txt: Republicans “have shown themselves willing to cut millions off their health insurance and eliminate preexisting condition protections for millions more, even in the middle of this public health crisis."

description_txt: stated on March 31, 2020 in posts on the Internet:
quote_txt: If you ask Amazon’s Alexa about the origin of the coronavirus pandemic, it says “the government planned” it.

description_txt: stated on April 9, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says all Vegas hotels but Trump’s have donated food, rooms in COVID response.

description_txt: stated on April 4, 2020 in a tweet:
quote_txt: Says 3.5 million U.S. citizens lost their employer-tied health insurance in March, while zero lost their coverage in 20 other large nations combined.

description_txt: stated on April 15, 2020 in a Politico interview:
quote_txt: “In a matter of days, and in some cases the moment may even have passed, that we’ve reached the peak of the rate of infections.”

description_txt: stated on April 12, 2020 in an image:
quote_txt: Says Dr. Anthony Fauci “stands to lose 100 million dollars on Bill Gates ‘vaccine’ for the coronavirus. Because he invested in this vaccine.”

description_txt: stated on April 15, 2020 in an interview on "Fox & Friends":
quote_txt: "This is COVID-19, not COVID-1, folks. And so you would think the people charged with the World Health Organization facts and figures would be on top of that."

description_txt: stated on April 12, 2020 in social media posts:
quote_txt: The $1,200 coronavirus relief checks this year are “just an advance on your next tax return. … Next year, you're automatically going to owe $1,200 come tax season.”

description_txt: stated on April 12, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says Michigan COVID-19 order bans gardening and the sale of vegetable seeds and fruit.

description_txt: stated on April 5, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says 44 senators “voted NOT to send stimulus checks.”

description_txt: stated on March 26, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: A photo shows two Italian nurses in a hospital a few days before they got COVID-19 and died.

description_txt: stated on April 14, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says Bill Murray said “Social media is training us to compare our lives ... No wonder why everyone is depressed.”

description_txt: stated on April 7, 2020 in remarks at a news conference:
quote_txt: “Illinois lags way behind all of our neighbors and certainly we’re in the bottom tier of states that are doing testing."

description_txt: stated on April 13, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: "The Postal Service is not losing money because of Amazon. It’s losing money because in 2006, the Republican-led Congress passed a law forcing it to prepay its pensions for 75 years, which no other corporation does ... Without this law, the Postal Service would be turning a profit.”

description_txt: stated on April 10, 2020 in Facebook posts:
quote_txt: Images show COVID-19 victims being buried in mass graves in New York City.

description_txt: stated on April 13, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: “Corona is so bad, this guy died twice!”

description_txt: stated on April 2, 2020 in a radio interview.:
quote_txt: ”If you line up all the countries that have done (Covid-19) testing on a per-capita basis, we’re at the bottom of the list.”

description_txt: stated on April 10, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says a video shows a “gay party in Italy few weeks before COVID-19.”

description_txt: stated on April 6, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says the Asian, Hong Kong, swine and bird flus each “killed more people than coronavirus.”
